data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Earl Nightingale has inspired more people toward success and fortune than any other motivational speaker on the planet.

data.author: Simon Cowell
data.quote: My proudest achievement has been the success of the shows and artists I have been involved with, because they were made in Britain.

data.author: Pele
data.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.

data.author: Noel Gallagher
data.quote: I don't dislike rappers or hip-hop or people who like it. I went to the Def Jam tour in Manchester in the '80s when rap was inspirational. Public Enemy were awesome. But it's all about status and bling now, and it doesn't say anything to me.

data.author: Thomas Aquinas
data.quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.

data.author: Leo Durocher
data.quote: I come to win.

data.author: William J. H. Boetcker
data.quote: Never mind what others do; do better than yourself, beat your own record from day to day, and you are a success.

data.author: Anne Rice
data.quote: Writers, as they gain success, feel like outsiders because writers don't come together in real groups.

data.author: Dada Vaswani
data.quote: True success, true happiness lies in freedom and fulfillment.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.

data.author: Tiffany Trump
data.quote: I don't know what it's like to have a typical father figure. He's not the dad who's going to take me to the beach and go swimming, but he's such a motivational person.

data.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
data.quote: The success of the Rat Pack or the Clan was due to the camaraderie, the three guys who work together and kid each other and love each other.

data.author: Robert Kiyosaki
data.quote: Finding good partners is the key to success in anything: in business, in marriage and, especially, in investing.

data.author: Michael Gove
data.quote: The single most important thing in a child's performance is the quality of the teacher. Making sure a child spends the maximum amount of time with inspirational teachers is the most important thing.

data.author: Sylvester Stallone
data.quote: Success is usually the culmination of controlling failure.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Microsoft has had two goals in the last 10 years. One was to copy the Mac, and the other was to copy Lotus' success in the spreadsheet - basically, the applications business. And over the course of the last 10 years, Microsoft accomplished both of those goals. And now they are completely lost.

data.author: Alan Price
data.quote: The one phrase you can use is that success has a thousand fathers, and failure is an orphan.

data.author: George Eliot
data.quote: It seems to me we can never give up longing and wishing while we are thoroughly alive. There are certain things we feel to be beautiful and good, and we must hunger after them.

data.author: Jules Renard
data.quote: Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.

data.author: Earl Wilson
data.quote: Success is simply a matter of luck. Ask any failure.
